name: Bugs&Features
description:
This is my Wowie! 2.0 game jam entry. Theme was "Intentional Bugs". Enjoy!!!

Word from dev: This game is about killing bugs and helping your "features" (aka happy little accidents) come to your PC which represents your project.  Use your mighty fix tool to get rid of the bugs while avoiding glitches around the map.

The game is full of small and probably unrecognizable features that change depending on your life points, and some other parameters not explained in the game. Recognizing these might be interesting to someone.

This is my first game jam ever and probably the first game that i can actually call finished.  I could always polish it more and add more content, but for the jam needs i guess this is enough.

Credits:

Music by Dinix - https://soundcloud.com/dinixbeats

Sounds by  SoundBible(http://soundbible.com)  ZapSplat(https://www.zapsplat.com)

Everything else by Me.
